about_the_game:
Fight enemies, collect gold and XP, loot chests, level-up your character, and clear dungeons, all by – you guessed it – clicking!


Battle against a large array of enemy types and bosses, each of which require different strategies and playstyles to defeat. Choose from a variety of classes and utilize their unique attributes and abilities to out-smart, out-skill or just out-smash your opponents. In combat, timing is everything; watch for when enemies are ready strike you, and for when they are themselves vulnerable to attack.

Build and upgrade buildings to aid in your quest. Have your villagers help in gathering resources or train soldiers who may come in handy in fight.


Defeat Enemies and farm XP to level your character. Unlock perks throughout the campaign and progressively build your character into a force to be reckoned with.


Choose from a motley crew of classes, each with their own skills and abilities, as well as strengths and weaknesses. Cast powerful spells as a mighty wizard, summon undead warriors to fight for you as a necromancer, outsmart opponents as a cunning rouge, or just hit your opponents really hard in the face as a slightly-less-cunning barbarian.

Multiplayer - coming soon!

Team up with friends, combo abilities and work together to beat extra tough opponents.

And more...

  • Supports gamepad
  • Designed for Steamdeck

name: Click to Clear

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 Home 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500K or AMD® Ryzen™ 5 1600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia 1660 or RX Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 Home 64 Bit or Windows® 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-9700K or AMD® Ryzen™ 5 5600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia RTX 3070 TI or RX 6750 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Click to Clear is a minimalist dungeon crawler that combines incremental clicker mechanics with a high fantasy RPG setting. Skillfully fight your way through a campaign spanning multiple diverse biomes against a large variety of challenging enemies and bosses.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
